How to check TLS Cert Expiration Date

Sep 20, 2018 
$ kubectl -n devops get secret
NAME                             TYPE                                  DATA      AGE
default-token-88ssj              kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3         109d
devops-grafana                   Opaque                                3         102d
devops-grafana-token-ldcsh       kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3         102d
grafana-tls                      kubernetes.io/tls                     2         91d
istio.default                    istio.io/key-and-cert                 3         35d
istio.devops-grafana             istio.io/key-and-cert                 3         35d
istio.kube-state-metrics         istio.io/key-and-cert                 3         35d
istio.prometheus                 istio.io/key-and-cert                 3         35d
kube-state-metrics-token-qb2d2   kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3         105d
prometheus-tls                   kubernetes.io/tls                     2         91d
prometheus-token-6pfxv           kubernetes.io/service-account-token   3         105d

  name: grafana-tls
  namespace: devops

  selfLink: /api/v1/namespaces/devops/secrets/grafana-tls

type: kubernetes.io/tls
